title: Sangeet Soft Glam
description: Glittering Rose Lehenga Set: Flowy, subtle-glitter skirt and a structured, embroidered bustier. The sheer dupatta is draped simplyâ€”elegance without the weight.
Chandelier Earrings: Long, tiered diamond-and-silver earrings that catch the light beautifully.
Delicate Bracelet: A sleek, diamond-look bracelet provides a touch of classic, understated sparkle, balancing the statement earrings.
Floral Ring: An oversized, intricate floral ring adds a dramatic, romantic focal point to the hand.
Embellished Sneakers: The game-changer! Embroidered silver sneakers for peak style and all-night dancing comfort.
Soft Glam Makeup: Shimmery smoky eyes in mauve/taupe, defined brows, and a soft, glossy pink lip.
